metadata.name: Prelude
metadata.description:
The first - not the last. 🌍

Project by a choreographer from Brzeg, Poland 🇵🇱 - Dariusz Mrowiec

Movement: Dariusz Mrowiec (Poland) 🇵🇱
Music: Chills by Mindset (Germany) 🇩🇪 

I want to allocate a part of the profits from the sale and creation of the NFT to dance scholarships for children and youth in Poland.

This piece of movement will be the beginning of a story that I hope will empower the art of dance. This project, this token - it is a desire to open the door to new possibilities for dancers.

The buyer receives:
* 🔥 NFT file also in fullHD
*🔥 additional file created in cartoon style
* 🔥additional file created in abstract colors, perfect for the Metaverse art exhibition
* 🔥Original file without assembly and color creation.
* 🔥Dance school T-shirt, in which funds will be deposited for the dance scholarship - Send Worldwide 🌍🔥! ANY address!
